text: R362 between Dunmore and Glenamaddy The R362 road is a regional road in Ireland linking Dunmore on the N83 (via 5 km of the R360) with the M6 at Athlone. It passes through Glenamaddy, Creggs, Athleague and Curraghboy en route. The road is long. ==See also== *Roads in Ireland *National primary road *National secondary road ==References== *Roads Act 1993 (Classification of Regional Roads) Order 2006 – Department of Transport Category:Regional roads in the Republic of Ireland Category:Roads in County Roscommon Category:Roads in County Galway
title: R362 road (Ireland)
